## Optional Exercises

Exercises are opportunities to practices several concepts from a module. Most will take 15-20 minutes to complete.  
  
```{r}
h4("Cars Example")
make_button(file_name = "intro_exercise_file_mtcars", 
            module = "1", 
            file_suffix = "mtcars",
            button_style = "primary")
br()
br()
h4("Heart Example")
make_button(file_name = "intro_exercise_file_heart", 
            module = "1", 
            file_suffix = "heart",
            button_style = "primary")
br()
br()
h4("Subcell Example")
make_button(file_name = "intro_exercise_file_subcell", 
            module = "1", 
            file_suffix = "subcell",
            button_style = "primary")
actionLink("class1_exercise", "", icon = icon("bug"))

conditionalPanel(
          condition = "input.class1_exercise != 0",
          hr(),
          p("If you are participating in tidybiology live, then this is the file we will use in class. If you are not in a synchronous class, then feel free to use this additional file for practice."), 
          h4("In-class Example"),
          make_button(file_name = "intro_exercise_file_chromosome",
            module = "1",
            button_style = "danger"), 
          hr()
        )
```
